definition: foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks
to support/frame/rack/framework/classifier for planes, large vehicles, radios etc

sentences.english: Oh yes, I have to use a tripod to rest my Canon on.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我必須用三腳架支撐我的佳能小鋼炮。

sentences.english: A tripod is also an important tool for these slow sync shots.
sentences.chinese: 三腳架也是這些慢速同步拍攝照相機的重要工具。

sentences.english: Buy yourself a nice tripod and try this. It really makes a nice effect.
sentences.chinese: 買個好的三腳架去試試，效果確實很好。

sentences.english: This quick-release system allows you to easily take the camera off the tripod.
sentences.chinese: 這種快卸系統可使您輕鬆地將相機從三腳架上取下。

sentences.english: You will need a camera tripod and of course a digital camera to do this.
sentences.chinese: 你將需要相機三腳架，當然，少不了數碼相機。

sentences.english: The cartilaginous framework of the tip has been described as a tripod.
sentences.chinese: 鼻尖的軟骨支架可以看成一個三腳架。

sentences.english: Position camera on tripod and prefocus on inside of tank.
sentences.chinese: 把相機固定於三腳架，預先對水缸內部調焦。

sentences.english: A heavy machinegun without a tripod to put it on is functionally worthless.
sentences.chinese: 一架沒有三腳架的重機槍是毫無作用的。

sentences.english: Learn how to do the tripod spin for breakdancing in this free video hip hop dance lesson.
sentences.chinese: 學習如何做在此免費視頻街舞課霹靂旋轉的三腳架。

sentences.english: A camera must rest on a tripod when photographing fireworks.
sentences.chinese: 當拍攝煙花的時候，照相機一定要固定在三腳架上。

sentences.english: There is a tripod supporting the cacciatore-shaped iron cauldron in the tomb.
sentences.chinese: 在墓內，有與釜配套的鐵三腳架。

sentences.english: Despite shooting in various lighting situations, he rarely uses a tripod.
sentences.chinese: 儘管要在多種光線下拍攝，但他卻很少使用三腳架。

sentences.english: If your shooter allows, reduce the shutter speed and use a tripod.
sentences.chinese: 如果相機可以，就延長快門時間，再用一個三腳架。

sentences.english: Always use a tripod when taking photographs of fireworks.
sentences.chinese: 當拍攝煙花的時候總是需要一個三腳架的。

sentences.english: This tripod is a treasure Trish cherishes.
sentences.chinese: 這個三腳架是翠西珍藏的寶貝。

sentences.english: Mount your camera on the tripod and compose your image to your liking.
sentences.chinese: 把相機裝在三腳架上，然後拍攝你的心儀之作。

definition: body of a vehicle or machine/fuselage of a plane
film/roll of film/also written 膠捲|胶卷
